entry.title: 考研英语单词（第四天）
entry.content:
第四篇 Empowering a Village: A Headmaster’s Forum on Conservation, Community, and Critical Thinking

​Once upon a time in a small village, there was a headmaster who was known for his shrewdness and rigorous teaching methods. He was responsible for the village’s education centre , a classic dome-shaped building with a permanent exhibition of reptiles.

forum -a place for people to discuss or exchange opinion

headmaster –principal -领导 -主要的 -负责人

was known for -be famous for

shrewd -very smart - clever，wise

rigorous –strict

dome – have a round top 穹顶

permanent -永久性

reptile -爬行动物

​One day, the headmaster decided to hold a forum on the topic of environment a conservation. The discussion included the importance of preserving water resources, especially during times of drought. The villagers were encouraged to practice water-saving measures such as using a cart to transport gallons of water, instead of wasting it on expensive and unnecessary activities.

conservation -protection conserve -protect -preserve

especially -particularly

drought – 形容词：dry

cart -small car

gallon -加仑（单位）

​During the forum, a royal guest speaker shared her experience in leading an electrical defence project. The project aimed to reinforce security systems by using advanced technology like virtual poles and smart loudspeakers. She also discussed how the project helped to conceal sensitive information from potential acts of treason.

defence -防御

reinforce -加强

poles -电极

loudspeaker-扩音器

sensitive -敏感

conceal -hide

treason -betray your country

potential -possible -likely -liable

​The villagers listened attentively, and soon the conversation shifted to the impact of modern society on traditional values. The headmaster highlighted the increasing discrepancy between the old and the new, using the example of analogue devices being replaced by digital ones, as well as the growing popularity of solo activities instead of community engagement.

discrepancy -gap -difference

analogy -类比，相似的

as well as -以及

​As the discussion progressed, one of the participants brought up the issue of fake news, which seemed to be a chronic problem in their society. The headmaster, being exceedingly wise, suggested that they establish a set of guidelines to help the villagers discern the truth from lies, He also emphasized the importance of critical thinking in today’s fast-paced world, where misinformation can easily trigger negative consequences.

progress -continue

issue -problem

fake -假的

chronic -long

exceedingly wise -very smart

discern -know -distinguish

​The villagers agreed with the headmaster’s proposal and decided toconduct a survey to gather opinions on the most pressing issues in theircommunity. They hoped that this initiative would not only raise awareness but also bring relief to those affected by the problems discussed.

proposal -a formal suggestion

conduct a survey -make a survey

initiative -措施 -action -practice -measure

relief -宽慰

​During the forum’s closing ceremony, the headmaster congratulated everyone for their active participation and immense enthusiasm. He reminded them that the key to a successful society lies in open communication and collaboration among its members

remind -make sb think of 名词：reminder 提醒

lies in –在于

collaboration -cooperation

​As the sun set and the villagers began to disperse, they felt a renewed sense of unity and responsibility towards their environment and community They realized that the taste of progress should not come at the cost of their precious resources and traditional values.

sun set -日落 sun up -日出

disperse -分散

taste -感觉，口味

at the cost of -以什么什么为代价

​In the days that followed, the village witnessed a remarkable transformation. The people adopted water-saving practices, showed more interest in community activities, and engaged in open discussions on various topics. They even formed a task force to combat fake news and misinformation.

witness -see

transformation -reform -innovate -revolution

a task force -一个工作组 task -任务 force -力量，人

​The headmaster’s forum had sparked a positive change, demonstrating thepower of education and awareness in shaping the future. The village became ashining example of a society that thrives on collective efforts, understandingand the pursuit of knowledge.

spark -trigger -stimulate

shining -闪亮的

pursuit -追寻

entry.title: 考研英语单词（第三天）
entry.content:
第三篇 Creative Connections: A Tiny Village’s Art Club Inspires Change

​In a small county, there was a tiny village where a unique art club had forty members. The club was popular and had a diverse membership, consisting of people from different backgrounds and statuses. They shared a common passion for art, and their activities varied from painting to sculpture.

creative - 有创意 -innovative -innovation

county -县城

membership -会员卡，会员身份

diverse -different -various

consist of -由什么组成

status 地位

shared common passion 在这里shared表示 有一样的

sculpture -雕塑 -statue

​One day, the club decided to organize an exhibition to showcase their members’ artworks. The event was scheduled to take place in a spacious suite in the village,which was large enough to accommodate all the art pieces and guests. The furniture had been moved to create enough space for the exhibition.

spacious suite -开阔空间

take place -happen -occur

accommodate -容纳 accommodation -食宿

​Among the club members, there was a _talented tailor who created a beautiful and intricate tapestry that depicted the biography of the village’s beloved queen. Her warm personality and love for her people had left a profound impact on everyone. The tailor used various mediums to create a dynamic and engaging piece that captured the essence of the queen’s life.

tailor -裁缝

intricate -complicate -sophisticated -complex -复杂的

tapestry -地毯

depicted -描述

biography -自传

beloved -受爱戴的

left … impact on sb -给谁谁留下影响

profound - deep and meaningful

mediums -媒介，手段，材料

dynamic -动态的，活跃的

engaging -引人入胜的

capture -抓住 capture the moment with photo

essence -精髓,精华

piece -片，块，这里指作品

​Another member of the club was a scientist who specialized in studying microscopes. He contributed a fascinating installation that demonstrated the effects of pollution on mankind. Through the microscope, visitors could see the harmful particles in the air,resulting from the excessive use of tobacco and other pollutants. This thought-provoking piece aimed to raise awareness and encourage people to take action to reduce pollution.

specialized in -专注

installation -装置

microscope -显微镜 telescope 望远镜

fascinating -引人入胜

demonstrate -证明，展示

mankind -人类

resulting from -由什么所产生

tobacco -cigarette -smoke

thought-provoking -引人思考 provoke-激发

piece 片，块 这里代指前面的装置

​The exhibition drew a lot of attention and attracted many visitors from nearby households. People came in successive groups, and it was a lively and bustling event. As the guests admired the artworks, they exchanged opinion sand engaged in discussions, which further enriched their understanding and appreciation of art.

drew -吸引

household -家庭

successive - 连续的

bustling - 熙熙攘攘 Hustling and bustling

appreciate -欣赏，赞同

admire -钦佩，欣赏

​However, there was a lonely old man who lived at the edge of the village. He had always wanted to join the art club but was hesitant due to his age and lack of experience. One day, he decided to persist in his passion and submitted an application for club membership. The members warmly welcomed him,showing that there was no limit to age or experience when it came to pursuing one’s interests.

edge -边缘 cutting-edge 尖端的

hesitant -犹豫

persist -坚持

pursue -追随

​From that day on, the art club continued to grow and thrive. The members organized marches to raise awareness about environmental issues and even started a petition to halt the use of tobacco in public spaces. Through their collective efforts and the power of art, they managed to make a significant impact on their community, both from a social and environmental standpoint.

thrive -prosper -繁荣

march -游行，行军 -campaign

petition - 请愿

halt - to stop

collective -集体的

managed to -设法做某事

significant -big -huge -great

standpoint -立场

​This story serves as a reminder that every individual, regardless of their background or size, has the potential to contribute positively to society. With determination, obedience to their passions, and the right incentives, people can achieve great things and make a lasting impact on their community.

serves as a reminder that -提醒着

obedient -服从

incentive -motives -动机

lasting -持久的 -endure

entry.title: 考研英语单词（第二天）
entry.content:
第二篇 A Talented Youngster’s Journey

​Once upon a time, there was a talented youngster named Will, who lived near the ocean. His genuine love for singing was his most remarkable trait. Everyday, he would go to the seashore and sing beautiful songs, which delighted everyone around him. His dream was to become a famous singer and perform on the grandest stages.

Youngster–youth-teenager-adolescent 青年人

genuine - 真正的 genuine Chinese food 地道中国菜 -real - authentic -sincere

remarkable - great

remark – 评论

trait–特质，特征 – feature

​One day, Will learned about an audition in the city. He decided that it was his duty to ‘give it a try. After arriving at the designated location, he discovered that the audition was for a prestigious singing congress. The competition was fierce,and the pressure to perform well was immense.

audition - 试镜

designated – 指定的

prestigious–有声望的 respectful and famous

congress-国会

fierce – very strong - intense

immense-huge –very big

​As he waited for his turn, Will tried to remain calm. He knew that his earnest efforts and daily practice would help him stand out from the rest. However, a group of youngsters decided to boycott the audition, claiming that the event organizers manipulated the results. This information caused some unrest among the participants.

turn 转换，轮次 is your turn 轮到你了

earnest - 认真的 - serious

stand out 站出来，脱颖而出

rest - 其他人，休息

boycott - 抵制 boycott Japanese goods 抵制日货

manipulate - control

unrest -动荡

​Trying not to let the rumors interfere with his performance,Will focused on his talent and passion. When it was finally his turn, he stepped onto the stage, and the moment he started to sing, a harmony filled the air. The audience was mesmerized by his voice,and even the grumpiest person couldn’t help but smile.

rumor - 谣言

interfere - 干涉 interrupt or hinder

passion-enthusiasm

the audience was mesmerized – attracted

grumpiest - grumpy– angry

​During the performance,Will felt a sudden numbness in his hand. He glanced down and saw a cable that had come loose from the sound equipment. in an instant, he used his free hand to snap the cable back into place, never missing a beat. This quick thinking saved his performance and impressed everyone in the room.

numb 麻

cable – 电缆 charge cable 充电线

snap 打响指，这里指把电线快速插回去

beat – 节拍

impressed - 留下印象

​After the audition, the judges tallied the scores. They took into account every aspect of the participants’ performances, from their vocal range to their stage presence. The margin between the top contenders was incredibly narrow. lt was a nerve-wracking wait for Will and the other contestants.

tally - record 记录

take into account– 考虑 - consider – take into consideration

margin - difference –差额

contender - 竞争者 – contestant – competitor

narrow – 狭窄

nerve-wracking –伤脑筋 nerve– 神经 wrack –破坏

​As luck would have it, Will’s beautiful singing and quick thinking during the cable incident earned him a spot in the congress. The news filled him with immense joy, and he vowed to work even harder from that day henceforth. His friends and family were delighted for him, and they couldn’t wait to see what the future held.

earned a spot –赢得一席之地 spot –小地方

henceforth–从此以后

what the future hold –将来会怎么怎么样

​The journey wasn’t without its challenges, though. Will had to face criticism,and at times, he felt miserable and doubted himself. But with every attack, he learned to retort with grace and continued to work on his craft. He always remembered the moment when he stood on the stage, ready to share his gift with the world, and that memory revived his spirit.

criticism - 批评

miserable- 悲哀 - painful and feel bad

retort – 反驳 talk back

grace – elegance graceful-elegant

craft – skill

revived – 是谁复苏，振兴

​Years later, Will became a celebrated singer, performing on grand stages and even touring on a private jet. His unwavering determination and incredible talent were an inspiration to everyone who knew him. He taught people that with hard work, perseverance, and a little bit of luck, dreams could come true.

unwavering – 毫不犹豫 waver–动摇

incredible – 不可思议的

inspiration – 鼓舞，激励

课后单词

genuine， authentic 真正的；sincere 真诚的

interrupt 打扰，阻断；hinder 阻碍

conference 会议

insulate 隔离，绝缘

wire n.线；v.接通

arrangement 安排

warfare 战争，斗争

chef 厨师；chief 首领，主要的

reveal v.揭示，显现，启示

dough 面团

pastry 糕点

consume 消费，吃

calorie 卡路里

latitude 纬度

fuel 燃料

workout 锻炼

entry.title: 考研英语单词（第一天）
entry.content:
记忆：放在语境当中去记忆

5500词融在100篇文章中去展现。

为什么考研英语难：

单词灵活运用的点太多，平常记单词只记几个意思

第一篇 Fortune at the Fair：An Unexpected Encounter

​In a small town, there was an annual fair that attracted a large crowd.People came from far and wide to participate in various activities and enjoy themselves. During the fair, a group of eighteen enthusiastic friends decided to try their luck at the games to earn some prizes.

Fortune - luck

Fortunate - lucky

Fortune–wealth–means

Encounter - meet

town- village - rural area 相对的 ：urban –都市 乡村和都市的交界处：outskirt 郊区

Fair 集市 Fairness 平等

​The friends entered a competition where the winner would receive a generous dividend.The game involved carrying a plaster statue across a grey plateau while avoiding various obstacles. The carrier had to be slim and agile to navigate the course successfully.

dividend-分红，奖励 – price – reward

entered- 进入，参加

plaster statue - 水泥雕像 相近词：plastic 塑料

across a grey plateau – 穿过灰白的高原

plateau -高原

obstacles - 障碍 -difficulties

slim - 廋 - thin

agile - 灵敏的 -flexible

navigate the crouse successfully - 顺利通过这个课程

navigate - 航行，导航 相似：negative 负面的

course - 课程， 这里可以理解为航线

​As they prepared for the challenge, the group overheard a grocer scolding a stubborn thief who had tried to steal some edible treats from his stall. The thief’s negative attitude cast a shadow over the otherwise joyful event. The friends decided to put that incident out of their minds and focus on their objective.

overheard - 偶然听到，不小心听到

grocer - 杂货店 – little store sells various simple things

scolding - 骂人

stubborn-顽固的

thief- 小偷，小贼 相似：chief 首领

steal - 偷

edible - 可以吃的，可食用的 – can be eaten

treats - 款待，零食

stall - 摊位，牲畜棚；

cast a shadow over - 蒙上了一层阴影

cast - 投射

shadow- 阴影 cast a shadow on - 给什么蒙上一层阴影

incident -accident 事件

objective - 目标 –goal - target -aim

​In the race, the participants had to pass through a cloud of gas, which they later discovered was a harmless oxide used for dramatic effect. At an intersection,they noticed a vegetarian cafe, which was a welcome sight for the weary competitors.

race – 比赛。种族 Bai people -白人

gas -毒气，煤气

dramatic effect -特效

intersection – 岔路口

vegetarian-素食主义

cafe - 咖啡店

oxide -氧化物 oxygen -氧气

weary- 疲惫的 - tired - exhausted 来源：wear

​As they continued, the friends encountered a landlord who had a peculiar way of pronouncing certain words. This sparked their curiosity, and they engaged him in conversation, comparing the local dialect with their own. The landlord emphasized the importance of preserving the town’s unique linguistic heritage.

landlord-地主

peculiar- 特别的 -special- strange

pronouncing - 发出声音

certain - 特定的，某些

spark curiosity - 激发好奇

engaged sb in - 使谁参与到，使谁投入到

dialect- 方言

preserve -保存 - protect -save

linguistic heritage - 语言的遗产

​During their chat, they learned about a secret shortcut that would help them in the competition. With the landlord’s guidance, they were able to make their way through the course with incredible velocity. As they neared the finish line, they spotted a car that had been transformed into a magnificent piece of art using trash and discarded materials.

velocity - 速度

spot - 看到

magnificent piece - 伟大的艺术品

trash - 垃圾

​Their willingness to help one another and work as a team allowed them to achieve their goal. As they crossed the finish line, they couldn’t help but feel a sense of accomplishment and pride in themselves. They had shown that,with perseverance and determination, anything was possible.

help one another - 帮助彼此

coulden’t help but - 情不自禁做某事

accomplishment - 成就 - achievement

​In an instant,they decided to subscribe to the local league, which organized events and activities to promote the town’s culture and traditions. They realized the scope of the impact they could have on their community by being active participants and contributing their skills and talents.

scope-范围

​As they celebrated their victory, the friends reflected on the day’s events and the valuable lessons they had learned. They vowed to continue supporting each other and working together to create a’ better future for their town. The once-innocent fair had turned into a life-changing experience that would stay with them for years to come.

reflected on -反思

vowed to -发誓 marriage vow 婚礼誓词

turn into 变成了，变为
